summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Office of Management and Planning; authorizing an Interlocal Agreement with King County for receipt of funds for growth management planning purposes; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1997 budget of the Office of Management and Planning for development of regional strategies to implement the Countywide Planning Policies; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Supplemental Subfund of the Emergency Fund; and declaring the emergency therefor.
